name: Cucumber Basil & Watermelon Salad
recipeIngredient: 1 English cucumber (chopped into 1/2 -inch (1-cm) pieces (just over 2 cups/500 mL)
1 ripe mango (skin removed and chopped into 1/2 -inch (1-cm) pieces)
1/4 cup 60 mL salted peanuts, crushed and toasted

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the tamari, garlic, ginger, lime juice, and rice vinegar.
Add the watermelon, cucumber, mango, serrano pepper, cilantro, and basil. Chill for 30 minutes. Drain a little of the excess liquid before serving.
Serve with the crushed peanuts on top.
